text: Xu Xiaoxiao (born 24 December 1992) is a Chinese snowboarder. She competed in the 2011, 2013 and 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of China Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Snowboarders at the 2017 Asian Winter Games
title: Xu Xiaoxiao
